input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Training Jersey'
  - Name='RAPHA Men's PRO TEAM Training Jersey'
  - Name='Assos GT Summer SS Jersey 2022'
  - Name='Santini x UCI World Champion Japan Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Men's Cycling Full Zip Jocob Hotel Custom Kevo Jersey Top M'
  - Name='Santini Sleek Bengal Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Evade Pro Base LS Jersey 2.0'
  - Name='men Santini UCI World Champion Belgium 2025 Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Summer C2 Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Interval Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Lidl Trek Replica Long-sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='men SANTINI Colore Puro Set Set'
  - Name='GORE WEAR Men's Spirit Signal Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='GORE WEAR Men's Spirit Moire Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='$150 Pearl Izumi P.r.o. Speed Cycling Jersey Upf Full Zip Men's S/m'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's HNH WSF Herd Bike Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Road Bike Jersey'
  - Name='men Jersey Santini Tour de France'
  - Name='Santini Pure Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Aether Pro Air Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's HNH Astro Bike Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Uci World Champion Long-sleeve Jersey Mondo Man'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Pro Air Jersey 3.0'
  - Name='PEARL iZUMi Rove Flannel Men's'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are high-performance cycling jerseys focused on training, likely with similar features like moisture-wicking fabric, form-fitting cut, and rear pockets.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Training Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Effectively the same product type as the reference, a pro team training cycling jersey with similar intended use and technical features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: RAPHA Men's PRO TEAM Training Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above, just a case variant; a high-performance training cycling jersey intended for competitive use, matching function and likely features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos GT Summer SS Jersey 2022
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A high-end summer short sleeve cycling jersey designed for performance and comfort; aligns well with the reference's function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini x UCI World Champion Japan Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A short sleeve cycling jersey built for competition; likely high quality but might be more race-oriented and possibly features differ from a training-focused jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Men's Cycling Full Zip Jocob Hotel Custom Kevo Jersey Top M
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full zip cycling jersey intended for similar use; custom design could imply additional features, but fundamentally similar in key aspects.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a cycling jersey with a focus on sleekness; without more detail, presumed similar but possibly differing in fabric or feature emphasis.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey designed for performance; not exactly short sleeve but similar construction and cycling purpose.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-level short sleeve cycling jersey for championship events; aligns in core function but possibly more race focused than the reference.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance summer cycling jersey, aligning well with the reference in terms of technical fabric and construction for comfort during rides.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A performance cycling jersey designed for intense training intervals, matching the core jersey's use, fabric, and features closely.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve replica cycling jersey; less relevant due to sleeve length and potentially different target use (team replica vs training).
